items.sentence: You look like a kid who was just caught with his hand in the cookie jar.
It was against school rules to wear makeup at the high school I went to.
Is it true that there are more male bus drivers than female bus drivers?
The bus didn't have any passengers on board at the time of the accident.
If the bus driver had had a gun, things might've turned out differently.
If it hadn't been for your raincoat, I would've been soaked to the bone.
Buckle down and get to work. Do you think we're on a Sunday picnic here?
No matter how interesting magic shows may be, I don't like them so much.
What that fortuneteller said yesterday is nothing to be concerned about.
This is how I've always done this, and I plan to keep doing it this way.
